channel.title: PI how to code multiple rareity drop percentages
channel.description:
explains it in the subject ^
EX:
6260:12 995:100000 6260:4 995:1000000
how would you code that because i over heard you can only make one rareity drop person monster percentage..

item.title: PI how to code multiple rareity drop percentages
item.dc:creator: @deans1243 deans1243
item.description:
@deans1243 wrote:

same as the regular items they will just go on the second line (unless the coinstants are brought up through constant.tsm im not sure)

item.title: PI how to code multiple rareity drop percentages
item.dc:creator: @deans1243 deans1243
item.description:
@deans1243 wrote:

the second number in the first ratio is the drop rarity for the monster so all the items would drop at whatever that is set at except for constants they will drop less frequently. Im pretty sure correct me if im wrong.

Read full topic
